plot: Nathan is a young boy who leaves alone with his mother in a poor area of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He goes through a day in his life where things are bound to go wrong. But even in his down low he will look for a silver lining.
title: Feliz Desaniversário
plot_es: Nathan is a young boy who leaves alone with his mother in a poor area of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He goes through a day in his life where things are bound to go wrong. But even in his down low he will look for a silver lining.
plot_en: Nathan is a young boy who leaves alone with his mother in a poor area of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He goes through a day in his life where things are bound to go wrong. But even in his down low he will look for a silver lining.
